author: Corey Knapp
title: April 13: What to Watch in Sports This Week When There Are No Sports This Week
description: We may still be without live sports, but this week gets a huge boost when the Michael Jordan documentary drops on Sunday night. The Last Dance is part of a full week of basketball new and old across sports networks...
content:
The Last Dance, a 10-part docuseries on Michael Jordan, premieres this Sunday on ESPN.JEFF HAYNES/Getty Images
